title: Balance T-Zone Instant Detox 2 in 1 Cleansing Clay 125 ml
description: Effective care for combination, oily skin in the T-zone (forehead, nose, chin). Suitable for use regardless of age.
cleaned_text: Balance T-Zone Instant Detox 2 in 1 Cleansing Clay 125 T-Zone cleansing clay is a cosmetic that provides effective care for combination skin, oily skin in the T-zone (forehead, nose, chin) and often dry on the cheeks. Suitable for use regardless of age. Properties: Flos-Lek Balance T-Zone cleansing clay is a 2-function cleansing and caring preparation designed especially for combination skin on the face, neck and décolleté. Daily washing with the use of clay provides the effect of perfectly clean and matte skin, while the application in the form of a mask has a smoothing, detoxifying effect on the skin and visibly improves its condition. The kaolin clay used in the cosmetic effectively reduces the overproduction of sebum, cleanses from toxins and oxygenates, and regulates (provitamin B5) has regenerating, moisturizing and smoothing properties. In turn, mountain rose oil, due to the high content of vitamin A and unsaturated fatty acids (mainly linoleic acid and linolenic acid), has strong regenerating, softening, smoothing the clay into damp skin, avoiding the eye and mouth area. Rinse with water. Use in the morning and evening. Mask: Apply to dry skin, avoiding the eye and mouth area. Rinse with water after approx. 15 minutes. Use twice a week. Package: 125 ml
